栘字的基本解释

栘
yí
即“唐棣”。
中国汉代称马厩。

栘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》弋支切，平支，以。］
［《廣韻》成臡切，平齊，禪。］
(1)木名。即唐棣。
(2)见“栘中監”。

栘字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栘； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页522第09
【唐韻】弋之切【集韻】【韻會】余之切【正韻】延知切，?音移。【說文】棠棣也。【爾雅·釋木】棠棣，栘。【註】樹似白楊，江東呼夫栘。【陸璣·唐棣疏】云：薁李也。一名爵梅。　又栘楊，木名。【古今註】圓葉弱蒂，微風大搖。一名高飛。一名獨搖。　又播栘，亦木名。【林邑記】柯葉發根下，虛中森羅，望之如懸鼓。　又栘中監，官名。【前漢·蘇武傳】栘中監蘇武留單于庭十九年乃還。　又【廣韻】成臡切，音匙。【集韻】?圭切，音攜。又演爾切，音?。義?同。

栘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
栘字的起名意思

即“唐棣”，元代画家。

Zhi
Basic explanation of words
Zhi
yí
Namely "Tang Di".
It was called a stable in the Han Dynasty of China.
Zhi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" Yi branch cut, flat branch, to. ]
["Guangyun" Cheng Nianqie, level, Zen. ]
(1) Wooden name. Namely Tang Di.
(2) See "Zhenzhong Supervisor".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栘; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 522 09
[Tang Yun] Yi Zhiqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yu Zhiqie [Zheng Yun] Extend Zhiqie,? Sound shift. [Said the text] Tangdi also. 【Erya·Shimu】Tangdi, Zhu. [Note] The tree resembles white poplar, Jiangdong Hufuzhu. [Lu Ji·Tang Tie Shu] Yun: Zou Li Ye. A Jue Mei.　You Zhi Yang, the name of the wood. [Ancient and Modern Note] The round leaf has a weak pedicel, and the breeze is shaking. A goofy. One alone shakes.　Broadcast again, Yimu name. [Lin Yi Ji] Ke Ye's roots are rooted, and the emptiness is in the middle of the forest, looking like a hanging drum.　You Zhizhong Supervisor, official name. [Previous Han·Su Wu Biography] Su Wu, the supervisor of Zhizhong, left the single in court for nineteen years but returned it.　[Guangyun] Cheng Nianqie, sound key. [Jiyun]? Guiqie, sound carrying. Acting Erqi again, sound?. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
Namely "Tang Di", a painter of the Yuan Dynasty.
yí
сущ.
1) слива
青栘 зелёная слива
2) диал. ива
3) конюшня
栘中监 конюшенный надсмотрщик; императорский конюший (дин. Хань)
